topic.title: Little Red Riding Hood
topic.shortdesc: Little Red Riding Hood finally makes it to her Grandmothers house. She shows what he brought her. But her Grandmother doesn't look right.

fig.title: Little Red Riding Hood and Her Grandmother

image.alt: Little Red Riding Hood visiting her Grandmother who is actually the wolf.

body.p: Little Red Riding Hood enters her Grandmothers house and finds that her Grandmother in bed.

"Hello Grandmother, I don't mean to wake you but I brought you some bread and medicine because I hear you were sick." Little Red sits next her grandmother on the bed and starts to pull out all the things out of her basket.

"Hello Grandmother, I don't mean to wake you but I brought you some bread and wine because I hear you were sick." Little Red sits next her grandmother on the bed and starts to pull out all the things out of her basket.
"Thank you so much for bringing all this to me, you are such a good granddaughter." The Wolf dressed as the Grandmother says.

"No problem Grandmother, I would do anything for you." Little Red gets a good look at her Grandmother and notices that something look different about her. "Grandmother I never noticed what be ears you have."
"Oh, yes with this sickness they have a tendency to swell."
"But Grandmother I never noticed what big nose you have." Little Red responds.
"Yes, as you get older, age affects you in mysterious ways." The Wolf replies.
"But Grandmother now that I notice what big teeth and mouth you have." Little Red responds.
The Wolf responds with " Well of course because I am not your Grandmother."
The Wolf responds with " Well of course because they are better to eat you with. "
